pr_title: Rdm 5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2

timeline.message: RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2

timeline.bodyText:
Hmm I thought it would be external like in description of the ticket:
v1 endpoint: https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api/blob/master/src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/ccd/endpoint/std/EventsEndpoint.java#L34-L53
v2: GET /cases/{cid}/events
so should likve in v2/external package and URL should not have internal prefix?
timeline.author: andrewfolga

replies.bodyText: The controller should not have the UI prefix then too.
replies.author: andrewfolga

timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.bodyText: If this is to be external then it should not have ui- prefix.
timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.bodyText: So this looks like internal endpoint but the story talks about external which would be located in equivalent CaseController class.
timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.bodyText:
this is duplicated with the already existing `getEvents(String jurisdiction, String caseTypeId, String caseReference)
The only difference between the 2 is that the above creates a different error message which indicates the  jurisdiction and caseTypeId.
String.format(RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND, jurisdiction, caseTypeId, caseReference)));
I think that's not an important detail and can be changed to only log the caseReference. If you do that you can find a way to easily reuse that logic rather than duplicating
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

replies.bodyText: Did some changes.... Please review the code
replies.author: kiran-yenigala-hmcts

timeline.bodyText: Is this correct? Are we retrieving also by event IDS?
timeline.author: andrewfolga

replies.bodyText: Also I think we retrieve audit event and not a single event. Could we fix that too?
replies.author: andrewfolga

replies.bodyText:
This is also not for dynamic display. Could we say:
"Retrieve audit events by case ID"
replies.author: andrewfolga

timeline.bodyText: Should it not say - Case audit events not found?
timeline.author: andrewfolga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -211,4 +219,43 @@ public CaseController(
 
         return status(HttpStatus.CREATED).body(new CaseResource(caseDetails, content, ignoreWarning));
     }
+
+
+    @GetMapping(
+        path = "/cases/{caseId}/events",
+        headers = {
+            V2.EXPERIMENTAL_HEADER
+        },
+        produces = {
+            V2.MediaType.CASE_EVENTS
+        }
+    )
+    @ApiOperation(
+        value = "Retrieve an event by case and event IDs for dynamic display",
+        notes = V2.EXPERIMENTAL_WARNING
+    )
+    @ApiResponses({
+        @ApiResponse(
+            code = 200,
+            message = "Success",
+            response = CaseEventsResource.class
+        ),
+        @ApiResponse(
+            code = 400,
+            message = ERROR_CASE_ID_INVALID
+        ),
+        @ApiResponse(
+            code = 404,
+            message = "Case event not found"

timeline.bodyText: Should it not be "Retrieve audit events by case ID"?
timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.bodyText: Can we extract this to V2.Error like "AUDIT_EVENTS_NOT_FOUND"?
timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.message: RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2

timeline.bodyText:
Aren't we missing other response codes here like 422 UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY from ValidationException (AuthorisedGetEventsOperation)?
Can you check whether others are not missing?
timeline.author: andrewfolga

timeline.message: RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2
RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2
RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2

timeline.bodyText:
we sure this is needed? DefaultGetEventsOperation always returns at least 1 event, the create event for a case.
And I think the other decorators that execute before this one will already return an empty list in case that single event is not accessible
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText:
same as above don't think:
null == events || events.size() == 0 
is needed
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.message: RDM-5903: Implement and consume external GET event details for case endpoint in API v2

timeline.bodyText:
Kiran can you review AuditEvent and make sure it's not missing any important event property and if all the properties we are returning are relevant?
Let's give this a thought as as we found out the v1 endpoint was not written by us. Perhaps we can take this chance to improve the json response that is returned
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

replies.bodyText: furthermore please test this with a citizen in addition to caseworker. The Service that has requested this endpoint will be accessing it with a citizen role so we should make sure it's working
replies.author: mario-paniccia
